title: El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail: Stories
body: Stories       Ysleta Mission       Ysleta Mission Church, 131 South Zaragoza Road, El Paso, Texas NPS       Ysleta Mission, the oldest mission (by two days) in the present day State of Texas, owes its heritage to Pueblo traditions, Franciscan Mission, and Spanish Colonial life in Northern New Mexico. Places To Go gives you a listing of sites along El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro NHT to visit. The Passport page let's you know which locations are involved in the NPS Passport Program.
